title: [OZC] RahXephon 1080p [unofficial FLAC remux]
description:
______   _______  ______    ___   _      ___  --------|

| |_|   ||       ||    __  ||     |_  ___|   ||   | | |

|______| |__| |__||___|  |_||___| |_||_______||_______|


 remux of Rahxephon, combing OZC's 1080p rip with his FLAC pack, including every audio source in one. Download this if you're too lazy to remux them yourself.

Take note, the default audio track on each .mkv is the first one, English Surround 5ch AAC mp3, so you must select the FLAC audio manually. 

Doesn't include the 'Bonus Material' folder because there is no lossless audio source for that.
